plot: When the Boss of "Truck Stop" Delivery Company hires the mysterious drifter, McCracken, his life unexpectedly changes for the worse. Much worse.
title: McCracken: Truckstop
plot_es: When the Boss of "Truck Stop" Delivery Company hires the mysterious drifter, McCracken, his life unexpectedly changes for the worse. Much worse.
plot_en: When the Boss of "Truck Stop" Delivery Company hires the mysterious drifter, McCracken, his life unexpectedly changes for the worse. Much worse.
